articles.title: Average Salary In India Likely To Rise By 10.2% In 2023: Report - NDTV
articles.description: Average salary in India is expected to increase by 10.2 per cent in 2023, mainly driven by e-commerce, professional services and information technology, a report said on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Top 3 sectors with the biggest projected salary increases are tied to technology, said the report.
